Articles.Content: PLEASE add an "undo" feature. I am really frustrated right now because I was building a ship that should have took 5 minutes but it took more like 30 minutes because I kept accidentally moving my other fuel tanks and stuff, messing up all the struts. Eventually, I finished the ship but later realized that the other fuel tanks weren't aligned with my radial decoupler. Then I ended up watching my kerbals fall to the ground without a parachute while the rest of the ship was exploding and bombing the KSC. Anyway. please add this feature, it would help a lot :I

Yep, already exists. As the others said, Ctrl+Z is undo.

That seems to be about it for this thread, I think.
